content: Can anyone tell me where we are with deploying support for this: http://www.fhir.org/guides/argonaut/questionnaire/ ?

When you say "deploying support," do you mean: what production implementations (will) support the API? Is this mostly a question for EHR vendors, or are there other organizations that would be building support for the various actors (Adaptive Questionnaire Service, Assessment-Bank, Answer-Bank, etc)?
